item.description:
$7 Movie Tuesdays -James Bond in Skyfall (2012) -Please get tickets at 6:45PM. --Movie Start time 7PM.  We still meet at 6:45PM in Lobby to go in at 6:50PM to get good seats. Most seats are all new and very comfy!!

 

James Bond in Skyfall (2012) Details: Bond's loyalty to M is tested as her past comes back to haunt her. As MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost. .In Theaters Nov. 9, 2012

 

This is one of the best Bond movies. The story is superbly put together and has some interesting twists, the action is well done. The actors all do a great job. Javier Bardem as the villain had a very interesting backstory and as you might have guessed already, Judi Dench is fantastic as usual as M and she even has more to do in the story this time around. This is not a completely formulaic Bond movie. Craig's bond is still more emotional than Connery or Moore ever were and for the first time we get some relatively detailed descriptions of his childhood. And something happens to Bond in the start of the movie that affects him for the rest of the film. But despite all that there are tons of James Bond trademarks like the martini, the introduction and even Q. This is not only a great Bond movie but just a downright great film.

Staring: Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, Javier Bardem, Naomie Harris and Ben Whishaw

 

MPAA Rating PG-13 (for intense violent sequences throughout, some sexuality, language and smoking)

Genres Action/Adventure, Sequel

Run Time: 2 hours 23 minutes ..yikes this is a bit long!

--------------------------------------------------

This looks like a great movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! So take a break from your work week and watch this great movie with us, some of your new pals. This movie looks great for 2012..... It’s time to see a great movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $7!

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA.

Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet.

Ciao Biagio

-------------------------------------------------------------

Note: There is a pre Movie dinner at Tudo Na Brasa 414 Main St Woburn, MA at 6 PM. Please do sign up for this dinner  seperately.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby. Walk into lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note: NOT the one on right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables.
item.name: $7 Movie Tuesdays -James Bond in Skyfall (2012)
